text: "Going, Going, Gone" is a song written by Bob DiPiero, John Scott Sherrill, and Steve Cropper. It was first recorded by American country music artist Bryan White on his 1994 self-titled debut album. It was covered by American country music artist Neal McCoy and released in September 1996 as the second single from his album Neal McCoy. The song reached #35 on the Billboard Hot Country Singles & Tracks chart. ==Chart performance== {|class="wikitable sortable" ! Chart (1996) !
